summary: Mr. Bean wins a trip to Cannes where he unwittingly separates a young boy from his father and must help the two reunite. On the way he discovers France, bicycling, and true love.
cast: Rowan Atkinson|Steve Pemberton|Lily Atkinson|Preston Nyman|Sharlit Deyzac|Francois Touch|Emma de Caunes|Arsène Mosca|Stéphane Debac|Willem Dafoe|Philippe Spall|Jean Rochefort|Karel Roden|Maxim Baldry|Pascal Jounier|Emmanuelle Cosso|Francis Coffinet|Catherine Hosmalin|Zazie Delem|Anthony Morabito|Adilson Monteiro|Michel Estrade|Stefane Mellino|Francois Chanut|Fabien Arnaud|Evelyne Guyon|Adrien Rodrigue|Francois Roche|Bams Betga-Tchouni|Louis Gomis|Gilles Gaston-Dreyfus|Julie Fournier|Flaminia Cinque|Urbain Cancelier|Dimitri Radochevitch|Luc-Antoine Salmont|Julie Ferrier|Nicolas Bridet|Nathalie Levy-Lang|Antoine de Caunes|Michel Winogradoff|Julien Cottereau|Éric Naggar|Ian Porter|Anthony Paliotti|Nader Boussandel|Bak|Bachir Allouane|Clint Dyer|Christopher Sciueref|James Kavaz|Jehanguir Byramjee|Steve Campos|Philippe Cariou|Thomas Lemoine|Luc Palun|John Snowden|Robert Stone|Pierre-Benoist Varoclier
title: Las vacaciones de Mr. Bean
